SELECT GRP_ID , GRP_NAME , GRP_MASTER , GRP_TYPE , DSC , CRE_DATE FROM SGMS_STD_GRP_LIST
SELECT A.GRP_NAME , A.GRP_MASTER , A.GRP_TYPE , A.DSC , TO_CHAR(A.CRE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CRE_DATE FROM SGMS_STD_GRP_LIST A WHERE A.GRP_ID = #{grp_id}
